scenes.action_text: AN EDUCATION Written by Nick Hornby 1 INT. SCHOOL. DAY 1 JANUARY 1962. MONTAGE A nice girls' school in a south west London suburb. We see girls doing what girls did in a nice girls' school in 1962: walking with books on their heads, practising their handwriting, making cakes, playing lacrosse, dancing with each other. 1A INT. CLASSROOM. DAY
